<title level="1" right="Rules">[Steeped In History 2nd](/Rules.aspx?ID=1474)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 64</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 2nd level in a branch, you learn about the history of the branch and the Magaambya in general. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about the Magaambya, the tenets or history of your branch, and members of your branch.

 At 11th level, this increases to a +2 circumstance bonus.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
